message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but I'd be willing to pay $100 for it.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're willing to make a serious offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $110.
